nodes.text: Luke and the Lost Jedi Temple

Luke and the Lost Jedi Temple is a young readers book written by Jason Fry and published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press. The book adapts The Weapon of a Jedi: A Luke Skywalker Adventure, one of Fry's earlier books, and it features a painted art style with stickers first revealed at Celebration Europe. The book comprises 24 pages, and was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on November 1, 2016. The story was later republished as part of the young-reader story collection Galactic Adventures Storybook Collection on October 2, 2018.

On the title, Fry stated "I really like pushing myself in a new format that I've
never tried before. I'm really excited and I hope kids out there will be too."
Originally announced for October 11, 2016, the title was delayed instead to November 1.
